reviewText: I'm very impressed so far.  Service was excellent.  We ordered this gown on 3/20, it arrived on 4/1.  Daughter has not tried it on yet..we are reserving the last star for the fit and will update later.  Gown is beautiful and looks basically just like the picture.  The color is a little bluer (more blue topaz rather than turquoise) than the picture, but that's not an issue as we weren't expecting it to be exactly the same.  Looks well made and they included a sewn in petticoat at no extra charge.  We were contacted the day after order placement and gave them daughters specific measurements.  She is a size 0.  There is a liner between the petticoat and legs.  Bodice looks sturdy and has boning throughout.  No scratchy edges to speak of inside, Nice and smooth.  The lacing for the corset back was also included and is not ribbon as I expected but an actual sewn piece of satin which is fantastic.  I will be recommending Artie dress to anyone I know looking for a good quality bargain priced prom dress.  Just for perspective, I found this same dress on another website for 518.00..  [REVISION 4-6]  Daughter tried on dress, it fit perfectly.  She felt very confident that the gown would not fall down (this is typically the issue for her with strapless dresses)  Discovered that the sewn in petticoat is uneven (one side longer than the other by about 12 inches), but it doesn't seem to affect how the dress hangs so I'm not taking any stars off for that.  It was an extra anyway. Daughter is very excited to wear this to Sr. Ball next month.

I wear these to work out, to sleep, to shower, and everywhere else. These earrings are AMAZING. You get a beautiful pair of rose gold plated studs that have some weight to them because they are made out of stainless steel, but without paying the price of an all 14k gold pair. The finish of the rose gold is beautiful. Not too pink. Not cheap looking. Totally matches my other 14k rose gold pieces. If you buy the 8mm size, just be sure to slide backs close to the backs of your lobes to counter the weight of the stud. If you don't, they will look like they are weighing your lobes down. I'm so impressed, I will be purchasing another pair in yellow gold, but probably in the 6mm size. The only thing I can say that I didn't care for was the packaging. They arrived safely, but were inside a small, cheap looking, clear plastic envelope with some sort of numbered sticker on top. Which was then placed inside a huge padded manilla envelope for shipping.

reviewText: Perfect fit.  I got this for my son and he chooses this foot wear above all else and is wishing to wear it to school.  Thank you.

I'll be honest, I'm already a HUGE fan of Crocs in general- mainly because they've started making everyday shoes that I can actually wear to work.  I'm a bit of a fanatic actually... I tell everyone about them because they're so incredibly comfortable and it's amazing to not have me feet ache at the end of the day.  Anyway, I purchased these for my 9 year old son because he's autistic and unable to tie shoelaces (it's a good day when he can get them on the right feet!); also, he's constantly taking his socks off.  This shoe is great because it's like having a built-in sock.  This way he can actually wear shoes he's comfortable in when it's cold out and his feet stay reasonably warm and dry.  I highly recommend them for kids that hate socks.
summary: I tell everyone about them because they're so incredibly comfortable and it's amazing to not have me feet ache ...

reviewText:
I got a pair of these for my son. His old pair of crocs had worn out and were a dual size 10-11 so I wasn't sure what size to get. Looking at the sizing chart I measured his toe to heel length and found it to be 6-5/8". So I ordered a size 11 (6-7/8"). This should be 1/4" larger than he needs. Upon receiving the pair they were a bit tight. Thankfully Amazon has the free return service for these and I sent them back and ordered a size 12. If you don't have a single sized older pair that you can reference and need to use the sizing chart, I would recommend getting a size larger than what it lists.

I like that the inner lining isn't as thick as is on some other versions. You will end up having to clean out some bits of leaves and pine straw over time and the fibers will begin to lay flat and wear thin. But they usually last long enough before you have to purchase a new larger pair. These liners are permanently attached, but because they are thinner it is easy to wash them with some soap and water.
summary: Thinner Liner make for less dirt and debris in them. Easier to Clean. Still nice and comfortable and warmer than Plain Crocs.

reviewText: It is so cool. My 6y old son wears this 12size  perfectly.
This run larger than the Classic clogs, although my daughter was still able to wear them. She was just a little clumsy at first. They're nice & warm, and she loves the purple.

These are nice but be careful about sizing. My son wears 8-9 in regular Crocs (unlined); I bought the 9 in these lined Crocs, which ended up being significantly smaller than the 8-9, and then I exchanged those for size 10, which were about an inch longer. Aside from that, the shoes seem durable and soft on the inside. The material seems somewhat thicker / less flexible than the traditional Crocs.

My son loves these - he hated transitioning back to real shoes and socks for the fall, and these definitely helped to ease the transition. They're warmer than regular crocs but still easy to get on and off. Just be warned that the lining does make them harder to clean, should your child wear them in dirt/sand.

However - I have one serious complaint - NO JEWELER should ever have a return label on the package indicating that the contents is jewelry by having the name saying "JEWELER" . It is an invitation to have the package stolen, taken or conveniently lost - Fine Jewelers only place the initials of their Business name or the name only but never say anything that conveys or informs JEWELER - JEWELRY etc .

My favorite Amazon purchase to date! High quality and gorgeous! I received so many compliments while carrying it as a bridesmaid at the reception of a wedding. Fit my iPhone 7, necessary cards and ID, and a few pieces of small makeup.

I was so excited about this clutch and it arrived the day before the ball I'm attending. It barely fit my Samsung Galaxy S5 phone, but I managed to get it closed. I knew it was small so I just hoped that my phone would fit once it was delivered. I was disappointed because most of the larger rhinstones were really foggy so they didn't have the same shiny appearance as the other small rhinstones covering the clutch, and the foggy stones were very noticeable. The larger rhinstone also have noticeable scatches right out of the box. There are 2 medium rhinstones that look as if they are about to come off. It came with a short and a long chain. The short chain was already attached, and I loved it. I really wanted to try the long chain, and I was extremely disappointed when the long chain wasn't even able to be attached. One end of the long chain was glued shut preventing me from attaching it, and the other end was broken off right out of the box. Attention to detail was not a priority based on my purchase and overall impression.

Although I'm disappointed in the defects, the ball is tomorrow night so it'll have to do. I am NOT completely satisfied with this purchase since there is a sticker on the box that says "Your Satisfaction Is Our Unremitting Pursuit."
summary: Gorgeous but has many flaws upon opening the box.

I have several of these tops and just love them! Heres my rundown after over a year. They run large but you want it to hang flowy, so i wouldnt get a smaller size. I wear a US 14 and am very pear shaped a large fit great. I wore the neckline to the side to have one shoulder exposed, this made one side hang lower as well and the draping very flattering. The chiffon is suprisingly good quality given the price. It doesn't cling or stick to my skin. Both the fabric and the design make the top very airy and cool. I find it quite comfortable to wear even in the summer in Houston. When you sweat in it it quickly dries, and the sweat circle is bearly visible. It still offers coverage on your arms so you don't freeze in restaurants. There is no tag but I wash mine on gentile cycle and then lay flat to dry. Be careful, because of this I have accidentally left the house more than once  with my shirt inside out. You can dress them up or down by changinv accessories. Probably the only trouble ive noticed is they do not go under coats well due to the bat sleeves.

These have got to be my favorite pair of jeans. Dreamy comfortable fit, very happy with this purchase.

My new favorite pair of jeans hands down!

When purchasing skinny jeans (especially online), it's always a little difficult to figure out whether to go a size up, stick with your normal size, or even go down one. I went ahead and got my usual size (2X), albeit with concern that I would have to suck my breath in and wiggle them on as I do with some skinny jeans, but these pulled on easily and I was so thrilled because I could tell immediately that the fit was perfect.

These are somehow stretchy while still conforming nicely to your hips and curves, yet not being too tight in the leg area!
I have been telling everyone about these because they are the best pair I've had in years, and i feel awesome wearing them!

I posted some photos of me in these jeans on my social media and got SO many responses...! VERY SEXY jeans that make your butt look AMAZING. I can't say it enough!

Unlike the previous reviewer, I had no issue with them loosening up. In fact, I am USED to that happening with all my stretchy skinny jeans. I have a pair that look so good on right after washing, but after about 30 minutes are sagging in the back. THESE jeans however do NOT sag at all.
I wore them THREE times before washing,  and they fit just as well the third time. They loosen up naturally, but only a little bit which is NORMAL with stretchy fabric. They do NOT sag, the hug my bottom beautifully :)

They are so comfortable, unlike my other skinny jeans which tend to cut off my breathing a bit in the belly area. These move with your body and look good at the same time!

My only problem is when I am putting them on, I keep catching my toe in the destroyed part on the front leg, but that's my own fault, I just need to remember to be more careful when putting them on.

You are sure to get compliments in these, I sure did!
*Sample provided for review purposes, all opinions are my own
summary: Sexy and form fitting, with great stretch!

I know this says mens but I bought it for me to use when we went to Disney.  I hate wearing hats (I really don't look good in them) but with the heat that I knew I was going to be experiencing, I was willing to get over that.  I wanted a running hat because I figured that the moisture wicking aspect would help me feel cooler in addition to the open mesh.  The hat was comfortable to wear and nice and airy.  It dried quickly after going on water rides and did not trap my sweat in, instead allowing it to evaporate as promised.  My husband will wear it for running now that we are back from the trip but the one thing I don't like about it is that the sweat band area is not an absorbent material so it does not stop sweat from running down your face (the hat minimizes the amount of sweat that you produce but it doesn't block what does form from falling).  That is one thing that is better about my husband's running hats from other brands.  Overall though this hat definitely served its purpose.

I ordered this ring so I would have something to wear when I took my real ring in for repair. The center stone is a little large for my taste. From far away it looks pretty but close up you can see the flaws in the setting. The stones in the channels are not all in a straight line. There is a white residue in some of the creases that I can't clean out...it may just be an unpolished edge that appears white in color. The CZ in the channel doesn't sparkle as much as the center stone. The stainless steel setting appears dull and darker than white gold/platinum/silver. Looks pretty as long as you don't look too close and is about what I expected for the price.

ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS!!!! The stock photos do not do it justice!! Get ready for a lengthy review, lol! There are some buyer photos including my own that help more...But seriously. Its Soooo sparkly and shiny I wanted a larger stoned ring to replace my last one that I now where on my right hand. My original wedding set (bought on amazon, btw, also amazing)  has inlaid CZs, which for me tend to be sturdier than the alternative. Really excited to finally find another inlaid set. I am a bit nervous for the front stones, so I will be updating this review in 6mo. and a year... Or until a stone falls out, as they are not inlaid, and other reviews have said they've come loose. However, I don't feel like it would totally ruin the look of the ring, and for the price, might as well just buy a few for back ups if it does ever happen. It's a light ring for it's size if it were real, but it does still have some top heavy weight to it that makes you feel like you're actually wearing an expensive ring, but it's not at all bothersome. As for size, I was always a 7 so I always order 7, but I think I'm more a 6.5 these days. It fits the same as my other size 7, however it doesn't flip around wuite as bad as my other engagement ring-- I'm assuming because of how the band is spread out. Either way, this thing is gorgeous, and from an arm's length away, unless you knew diamonds REALLY well, I don't think you'd be able to tell it's not real. And you gotta love stainless steel. I work a rough job, I do have a silicone ring for most of the time, but some days I forget, so its nice to have a metal that doesn't bend too easily or tarnish. They do scratch easy though, but that's the nature of the metal and eventually the whole thing will be scratched and you won't really notice any of them.

This item comes from China so the sizing is very small compared to US sizes. I ordered an XL & the shirt is comparable to a US small- medium size. I normally take a size 10 -12 and there was no way this was anyway close to it. The quality is OK for the price but you can't return it because the cost to ship back to China is cost prohibitive. If I had know the sizing difference I wouldn't have ordered it. As it is, I plan to give it away to someone who can fit it.

Update as of 4/4/15, I have been contacted by the seller a number of times pleading with me to remove my review. I won't change the fact that the sizing is deceptive but I was willing to update my review if they had processed a full refund to reflect that they had in fact refunded my $$ without my returning the shirt. That did not happen, they initially compromised with a $5 refund which doesn't do me much good but I guess it was better than nothing. It couldn't even fit my 11 year old granddaughter who is 5"6" & 95 lbs! She couldn't even bend her arms! I ended up donating it to Goodwill. At this point I'd recommend to anyone NOT to buy from this seller!

reviewText: This is a very high quality and attractive ring. I especially like the high polish and durability. It is twice as strong and double the density of steel which is why it is the most resistant metal to scratching. It is extremely hard, ranking about 9 on the Mohs scale (10 is the highest such as diamond). It has a nice weight to it and the comfort fit shape feels great on my finger. Even though the cost is very inexpensive compared to platinum, it is superior in scratch resistance and the color is very close to that of platinum to where it is hard to tell the difference. It feels strange to spend so little on such a high quality wedding band set for my wife and I. You usually get what you pay for - not in this case. Anyway, I highly recommend this ring!
summary: If you like the look of platinum with superior scratch resistance, this ring is the one.

WARNING! WARNING! WARNING!
A lot of the one or two-star reviews say the ring breaks easily. They don't understand the difference between strength and hardness. This ring is incredibly hard, meaning it is almost impossible to scratch, but it is very brittle because there is no "give" in the material. It will not dent or bend like a gold/silver/platinum ring, it will shatter because of its hardness.

DO NOT BUY if you expect this ring to withstand drops. handle it very carefully while it is not on your finger. And if you do break it by dropping it, buy a new one, they are CHEAP compared to anything similar in white gold/platinum. You WILL NOT find another material that can look brand new after a decade of use like tungsten carbide can.

Added bonus: this ring is easier to remove from your hand in an emergency and much less likely to stay on your finger if smashed, unlike gold/platinum
summary: Know what you are buying. hard =/= strong

Requested a replacement from the seller who said cracking of tungsten rings is normal and to Google it (???) and if I sent a photo they would replace. Sent the attached photo months ago and no replacement was provided. You can see the chip and crack - the dark line through the middle of the ring.

Avoid this seller and get your ring from someone more reputable.

I would recommend them for anyone that does a lot of heavy work with their hands (my real wedding set sits in the safe because grew tired of paying for prong replacements and the jeweler asking "what are you doing?!?!" when they had to re-bend the bands to a circle shape) as they hold up well.

Love this 3mm White Tungsten ring. 3mm White Tungsten Carbide Polished Classic Wedding Ring Size 7.5 I have beaten up my platinum rings and replaced so many prongs that they are now in the safe. I lost my last tungsten band that was from the jewelry store and waaaaaaaaaaay more expensive. I've worn it for months with no scratching. I bought this ring and a 2MM ring because I wasn't sure which I would like best and the prices were certainly right (plus I then got free shipping!). I like the 3mm width best. I don't know why anyone who works with their hands wouldn't own one of these. Size of ring seems accurate to me.

reviewText:
My fiance and I got a set of these (3 mm for me, 5mm for him) during our engagement and absolutely love them. We worried the reviews were too good to be true, but for the price, we figured they'd be a worthwhile experiment. And they definitely were!
I use mine as a substitute for my wedding ring while at work. I work in a science lab and was tired of taking my wedding ring on and off to put on lab gloves. This ring is extremely comfortable (easy to forget I'm even wearing it!) and gloves easily fit over top of it. It's also really durable. While the white gold of my wedding ring is already showing some scuffing and dints from gentle use, I keep this ring on almost all the time at work and it still looks brand new.
As for my fiance's ring, I figured he'd also want to use his as a "work ring" and I've offered to buy him a "real ring" of some kind of precious metal. But he loves this one so much, he doesn't want anything else.
So, whether you use these rings as an alternate to your "real ring" or use them as your main ring, you will be happy with your purchase!
summary: Gorgeous and durable: would have paid $100 for this ring and still consider it a steal!

Too shiny

Using it as my wedding ring since early June.  After 3+ months I've had no skin irritation or other complaints.

The size is true to other "10" rings I've tried on.  With a few exceptions the ring is on my finger 24/7, including showering, and has been knocked against other metals or other things that I'd expect to scratch softer metals, it's still as shiny as the day I put it on, no scratches.

One thing to consider, as a friend reminded me, is that unlike gold these harder metals cannot be easily cut off your finger if you're injured... I work on my car and other mechanical stuff quite a lot--For all rings, but especially ones made of harder metals: Removing the ring before you do anything where you might injure the finger is a good idea, as is getting it off the finger ASAP if you do injure yourself.
summary: Using it as my wedding ring since early June.  After 3+ months I've had no skin irritation or other complaints.

reviewText: Beautiful ring for an awesome price! I'm a size 4, and although this ring is comfort fit, it is true to size. It's super comfortable and has a good weight, but I can barely feel it on my finger. The mirror finish makes it super shiny, and only time will tell how it holds up to everyday wear and tear. I can't wait to wear it after we get married! This will probably be my go-to ring since it's very comfortable to wear and appears to be very sturdy. I can see it holding up to kayaking, traveling, household chores, etc. My job requires me to wear gloves. As you can imagine, the engagement ring tends to get caught (not to mention is not sterile), so I'm forced to take off my engagement ring each time I don a new pair of gloves. I plan on reserving wearing the engagement ring for going out, and I don't plan on taking this ring off after we get married. The description says nickel is used as a binder, so hopefully there are no allergy issues. We'll see how it holds up, but so far it seems very nice and good quality.

reviewText: Nice ring!

APPEARANCE:  In terms of color, this piece very closely resembles white gold. It is only a half shade or so darker in hue, but this is only noticeable in a side-by-side comparison. In reality, no one will know this isn't white gold. The ring looks and feels substantial and expensive. (NOTE: if you want the "white gold" look, be sure to buy WHITE tungsten, not regular tungsten. Regular tungsten is a darker gray.)

COMFORT: Looks and wears like a true comfort fit with smooth, rounded edges.

DURABILITY: Two and a half months after our wedding, there is not a single scratch on this ring, even when viewed under magnification. It looks absolutely brand new. Despite the fact that tungsten is naturally more brittle than gold alloy and other metals used in jewelry-making, so far the ring has stood up to what I would consider an above average level of wear and tear without breaking.

PRICE: Ridiculously affordable. Just under $18 as opposed to $300-400+ for good quality white gold (that scratches and needs polishing once a year)? A no-brainer. Plus, you get to skip the worries that accompany wearing an expensive piece of jewelry. If you ever lost this ring, replacing it would be a breeze. Eighteen bucks and two Prime shipping days later, voila! Brand new ring, negligible damage to your wallet.

WOULD I BUY AGAIN? Without hesitation. We couldn't be happier with this purchase.

reviewText:
Love this ring, love white tungsten carbide! If you are looking for a workhorse of a wedding band, white tungsten carbide is the way to go.

My husband has wore 2 consecutive gold bands to paper thin nothingness. This ring in the 4mm has been great for him; he works in maintenance.

I've had a 6mm from MJ Metals since 2014 and wear it almost everyday. I work part time as a florist and love gardening, so that ring has been through some rough times and it still looks fabulous. I need my bifocals to see any wear.

I wanted to try a wider band, so of course reordered from MJ Metals. I love it. My sister tried it on and said her pinky finger started to fall asleep after wearing it for a few hours. She doesn't have that problem wearing the 6mm. Maybe that's why the 8mm is more of a men's size. The other difference between the 6mm and 8mm is the edge of the ring. The 6mm has a thicker edge than the 8mm. Both are comfort fit and domed. My guess is the 8mm dome would be uncomfortably thick to taper to the edge thickness I'm used to on the 6mm. Again, after 3 years, I love my 6mm white tungsten carbide.

The only other fyi is on the color. It does have a dark under tone next to sterling and white gold even though it has a mirror shine like chrome. So, the color may bother someone looking to wear an engagement ring on the same finger as this ring.
summary: White Tungsten Carbide is a beautiful workhorse of a wedding band

My first prime order was delayed significantly, however I understand it was an issue with Amazon fulfillment not with the vendor selling this product and it did get worked out to satisfaction.

The ring itself looks great and while I did have to eventually return/reorder to get the right size for me, I'm very happy with the product.  it looks great, feels great, and is exactly what I wanted. I would order from them again.  Other reviewers have reported the ring is brittle and may break.  So far so good for me (and I have dropped it on a hard surface) but at this price even if that happened I'd not hesitate to order another.

reviewText: Looks good feels heavy. Don't know too much about jewelry but I do like how wide it is since I have large frat fingers. Makes my hand look normal.
Just what I ordered. Looks like white gold.

Comfort fit band that looks just like white gold (matches my engagement ring) but doesn't scratch. It's perfect! I ordered a titanium band too, just to see which I liked more, but the white tungsten is just more comfortable and durable.

I wanted something I could wear to work because I was tired of my gold ring getting beat to hell. I had a tungsten one previous, but my finger got bigger and it no longer fits. This one looks good and being tungsten carbide is good for taking a beating without showing many scratches. Even if I managed to smash it, I wouldn't be out much money. Better than smashing a gold ring.

Comfortable, nice looking and strong. I lift weights and needed a 'stunt double' to take the place of my gold wedding band. This one fits the bill. One note: it runs just a little big. If your ring size falls in between their sizes, I would get the next smaller. My ring size is right between 9 & 9.5. I opted for the 9.5 to be safe. Had to return it for being a little too loose, and get the 9.
Great for an extra ring! Very pretty and shiny
Fits and wears good

This ring is awesome! I couldn't wait to get it after reading all the great reviews! It has substantial weight but not too heavy. It slides onto my finger like butter. It is true to size. I bought it for a ring guard because my wedding ring is too big, but i didn't want to have it resized. The color is more "blue" next to white gold, but still looks great. It is super shiny, you can litterally see my reflection in the picture. I debated A LOT between the 6mm or the 5mm because I wanted a thick band but not outrageous. I think the thicker band would be great on its own, but the 5mm pairs great with my original ring. Great buy! Love this ring!

UPDATE: I have had this ring for almost 4 months now, not a scratch! Still looks as shiny as the day it was delivered. I have dropped it a couple times onto ceramic tile and expected it to shatter like some reviews I read, but it just bounced! I love this ring and would recommend to everyone I know.
Love it!

I previously gave this item a 2 star rating due to the fact that the sizing advice (in my opinion) was bad.  Since then I have found out that the guidance provided (to get a size larger than your size if the ring is a wide ring) was allegedly, not the guidance of the producer of this product but rather AMAZON guidance?  In my case this was bad guidance, having said that, the company in question answered all of my questions and is willing to take the ring back for a full refund.  I have subsequently ordered another ring in my size because I can and must say the quality is great.  As for the return of my first ring I have not decided yet, I may keep it just in case my finger gets bigger.  Additionally, once I get the new ring if it fits well I may order a gold plated one in addition to the one I have.  Good company, great ring.  I recommend you order you exact size regardless of the width of the ring.
summary: Great product, questionable sizing guidance by AMAZON

I love this ring so much that I bought three of them! The color is very close to white gold-it is a bit darker, but not as dark as regular tungsten. This ring has a lovely shine. It feels smooth and fits great! No worries about scratching it like you do with real gold. I like the 4mm-but I also got the 5mm. I think both are nice for my slim fingers. The ring is absolutely beautiful, I love it! It is great quality & totally worth the price, you could not get something like this a jewelry store for this price. The only reason I'm rating 4 out 5 is because my ring size is 7.5 and that's what I ordered, fits a little big so size 7 would have been perfect. Completely satisfied otherwise!!!

doesn't look like the picture. more like chrome. but it is strong against scratches. some reviews say you must ask for half a size bigger since they run small. reviewText: I had this for less then a week and there is already scratches all over the ring, I work in a office setting so i really don't know why this is getting scratched up, i would hate to see this being worn while doing a lot of manual labor.

reviewText: Love the ring,  looks just like white gold. I've had it for a year and looks like new. These rings run true to size.

I misplaced my 5mm Platinum wedding band somewhere in my house right before a business trip to Las Vegas.  Yeah, the wife didn't buy it either, but it happened.

After not being able to locate my band for a month, I decided to pick up this ring as a stand-in until my band surfaces.  Looks just like my Platinum band with one exception - this band isn't scratched to heck.  :)  Platinum looks great when new, but within a month it develops micro-scratches that make it look dull and cheap, requiring professional polishing to restore it, which I have done a grand total of one time in the last ten years.

I really do hope to find my Platinum band at some point, but even if I do, it will just go in a drawer for safe keeping.  This ring looks far better and is very comfortable.  The only significant difference I notice is the weight - my Platinum band is far heavier.  Platinum is also extremely strong while I understand this ring is not, but I doubt that issue will surface...and even if it does, I liked the ring so much that I bought I second one as a backup for my backup.
summary: Looks just like my Platinum wedding band

I needed a new ring after losing some weight recently. I previously had a James Avery gold and silver ring and decided the two tone was a dated style. I tried out a tungsten carbide with brushed finish before ordering this one. The regular tungsten is much more grey than most pictures illustrate. My wife said it looked like I had a piece of hardware/nut ok my finger.

Not this ring though. The polished white tungsten is beautiful. The style is very simple but very shiny and beautiful. I don't review that many products unless I feel deceived or super happy with the product. This is both since; I reviewed the regular tungsten carbide ring before this. I couldn't be more happy with the look, feel (very comfortable), and value.
summary: Truly a great ring-looks much more expensive

reviewText: I have a really bad habit of losing rings (plus I don't like how a lot of rings hang on things), but sometimes you just wanna signal to the world, "Hey, I'm taken, back off!" Haha. This ring was nicely packaged, came quick, fit perfectly, and looks great. I wish it were a shade daintier, but overall a great buy that I'm very happy with. Super comfortable and great price -- so if I lose it, I won't lose sleep over it. (I still think of the beautiful diamond wedding band I lost way too many nights before I fall asleep...)
summary: Excellent buy, tough, attractive, and comfortable

reviewText:
These wedding bands are comfortable, classic and look good with any white gold or silver engagement ring. In our opinion they run a little large, so we had to change them twice to have them stay fit.
Initially we needed them just for the wedding day, until we would figure out what bands do we want. But now, after seeing them we don't want to look for others. I actually just ordered them engraved:)
I would recommend them to anyone, regardless of their income. These bands look good and feel good.
( I god a 3 mm and my husband a 6 mm - both perfect for our hands )
summary: These wedding bands are comfortable, classic and look good with any white gold ...
